pages.text: Your body is augmented by one of several modifiers:$(br2)You can increase your reach, speed, luck, strength, slow fall or haste, gain absorption, renew your air supply, teleport items to yourself, or drift through the world as though spectral.$(br2)$(warning) This spell requires enabled modifiers to function.

pages.title: Spell Configuration
pages.text: $(bold)Cooldown:$() The spell has a cooldown of $(spell:augment/SECONDS/cooldown) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Magnetism:$() Items within $(spell:augment/radius_x) and $(spell:augment/radius_z) horizontally and $(spell:augment/radius_y) vertically are teleported directly to you.$(br2)$(bold)Reach:$() You are given $(spell:augment/reach) additional blocks of reach for $(spell:augment/SECONDS/reach_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Speed:$() You are given Speed $(spell:augment/ROMAN/speed_amplifier) for $(spell:augment/SECONDS/speed_duration) seconds.

$(bold)Slow Fall:$() You are given Slow Fall for $(spell:augment/SECONDS/slow_fall_duration) seconds.$(bold)Light Drifter:$() You drift as spectral light, seeing through the world for $(spell:augment/SECONDS/drifter_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Luck:$() You are given Luck $(spell:augment/ROMAN/luck_amplifier) that affects chests and fishing for $(spell:augment/SECONDS/luck_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Strength:$() You are given Strength $(spell:augment/ROMAN/strength_amplifier) for $(spell:augment/SECONDS/strength_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Haste:$() You are given Haste $(spell:augment/ROMAN/haste_amplifier) for $(spell:augment/SECONDS/haste_duration) seconds.

$(bold)Absorption:$() You are given Absorption $(spell:augment/ROMAN/absorption_amplifier) for $(spell:augment/SECONDS/absorption_duration) seconds.$(br2)$(bold)Air:$() Your air supply is increased by $(spell:augment/BUBBLES/air_amount) bubbles.
